plot outline: YUVA Sarkar is a story of young honest school teacher who accidentally became a part of active politics. His desire is to change the system and for that he has to face many problems. Generes synopsis-drama, political thriller. Content - young honest teacher who wanted to change the system one day became part of the active politics and faced many realities.
